function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of hygienic solutions in the built environment leading to increased transmission risk of infectious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission and public health issues.","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper hygiene protocols and design approaches to reduce transmission risk.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, touchless technology, and antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Residents, visitors, and public at large.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building developers."},{"Description":"Unmaintained personal cleanliness leading to increased risk of disease transmission in the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised public health.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs on the importance of personal cleanliness, and promotion of personal hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Hygienic products, hand sanitizing stations, and touchless fixtures.","People":"Residents, individuals, and households.","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, and educational institutions."},{"Description":"Inadequate spatial planning and design of washing areas in houses leading to a higher risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Inefficient combat against diseases, lack of proper sanitation, and compromised public health.","Mitigation":"Incorporation of proper zoning practices and spatial planning for washing areas, and adherence to traditional values in design and layout.","Technologies":"Modular and space-efficient washing area designs, touchless faucets, and antimicrobial materials.","People":"Residents, homeowners, and occupants of built forms.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and housing developers."}]}
